actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that no employee benefit may be subject to Federal income tax unless such benefit is specifically identified by Federal law as being subject to such tax.

summary.text: Prohibits the taxation of any amount received by an employee as an employee benefit (other than any amount received as wages or compensation) unless Federal law specifically identifies such benefit as being subject to taxation.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no employee benefit may be subject to Federal income tax unless such benefit is specifically identified by Federal law as being subject to such tax.
